Package com.xith3d.render

Interface Summary
CanvasPeer The canvas peer represents the physical location of rendering.
RenderAtom A render atom is a discrete chunk of geometry and shader that will be drawn.
RenderAtomPeer
RendererInfo Used so that the renderer can cache information within the scene graph.
RenderPeer The render peer is used to abstract the layer that does the actual drawing from the architecture of the renderer.
Shader A shader is what is responsible for setting up the graphics state to render an atom.
ShaderPeer
StateSortable The state sortable interface allows for rendering elements to be sorted according to a priority set in the Renderer.
StateTrackable Simple interface that allows the renderer to assign a state id to a node.
 

Class Summary
BackgroundColorAtom Atom that holds information about background color
BoundsAtom Insert package comments here
CanvasPeerBase Base helper class for all canvas peer implementations
ColoringShader The coloring shader encapsulates the Java3d standard coloring which are attached to an appearance
FogShader Insert package comments here
FragmentProgramShader  
GeometryCacheType This class is used to define the policy used by the renderer to cache geometry information on the card.
LightingShader Insert package comments here
LineAttrShader The line attributes shader encapsulates the Java3d standard line attributes which are attached to an appearance
MaterialShader The material shader encapsulates the Java3d standard material which are attached to an appearance
Option Holds RenderOptions enum objects
OrderedState The ordered state is used to denote that a particular atom must be sorted according to an order state first, before material sorting.
PolygonAttrShader The polygon shader encapsulates the Java3d standard polygon which are attached to an appearance
RenderAtomBase Base helper class for render atoms.
RenderBin A collection of RenderAtoms that will be prioritized and sorted for rendering.
RenderBucket A render bucket holds a render atom inside a render bin.
Renderer The renderer is the main class for managing the transformation from the scene graph to the 3d card.
RenderFrame Contains all the inforamtion to be rendered in a single frame.
RenderingShader The rendering shader encapsulates the Java3d standard rendering which are attached to an appearance
RenderOptions Storage class for configuring renderer options.
RenderPeerBase base abstract class which all RenderPeers should extend.
ShadowBin A collection of RenderAtoms that will be prioritized and sorted for rendering.
ShapeAtom Atom for rendering a single shape3d along with its geometry arrays
StateMap A state map is used to map objects to state id's.
StateNode Used to keep a cached copy of a state for the render engine.
StatePriorities A simple class for encapsulating a definition of a set of state priorites for sorting.
StateSortableMap A state sortable map contains a list of StateSortable items for which an atom may have.
TextureAttrShader The texture shader encapsulates the Java3d standard texture which are attached to an appearance
TextureShader The texture shader encapsulates the Java3d standard texture which are attached to an appearance
TransformShader The Transform shader encapsulates the Java3d standard Transform which are attached to an appearance
TransparencyShader The rendering shader encapsulates the Java3d standard rendering which are attached to an appearance
VertexProgramShader  
ViewStack View state is used to hold the current state of the scenegraph when the view is descending through nodes.
ViewState Stores a state of the scenegraph as relates to lighting and fog
